pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging

content.raw:
I searched about this when I added this function as well. It seems in the current `gazebo` repo we never import the `Filesystem.hh` from `ign-common`    
but rather using the `boost/filesystem.hpp` directly.   
I am fine with either way as long as we keep it consistent. If we port the ign-common's `directory iterator` functionality here, then we might want to  
change all the other places where we port `boost/filesystem` accordingly to use `ign-common` functionality
